Flow.description: Changes on the Thank You Screen

formulas.name: Description_Aftersales
formulas.expression: "Does your Request Relate to BackCare Order?:" & {!Does_your_Request_Relate_to_BackCare_Order} & {!Linebreak} & {!Description_ENGlong}

formulas.name: Description_Backmarket_Services
formulas.expression: {!Description_4} & {!Linebreak} & "Needed documents to open an investigation: (Documents nécessaires pour ouvrir une enquête:)" &{!Needed_documents_to_open_an_investigation_4} & {!Linebreak} & "Does your request relate to a BackCare order? (Votre demande concerne-t-elle une commande BackCare ?)" & {!Does_your_request_relate_to_a_BackCare_order_4}

formulas.name: Description_Catalog
formulas.expression:
{!Description_3} &
{!Linebreak} & IF( NOT (ISBLANK ({!What_would_you_like_to_get_instead})), "What would you like to get instead? (Que voudriez-vous obtenir à la place?) : " & {!What_would_you_like_to_get_instead},
IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!Which_product_are_you_actually_selling})), "Which product are you actually selling? (Quel produit vendez-vous réellement?) : " & {!Which_product_are_you_actually_selling},
IF( NOT (ISBLANK({!Which_information_is_wrong_or_needs_to_be_updated})), "Which information is wrong or needs to be updated? (Quelles informations sont erronées ou doivent être mises à jour?) :" & {!Which_information_is_wrong_or_needs_to_be_updated},
IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!In_which_category_the_product_should_be})), "In which category the product should be? (Dans quelle catégorie le produit doit-il être? :" & {!In_which_category_the_product_should_be},
IF( NOT (ISBLANK ({!What_is_the_correct_price_new})), "What is the correct price (new)? (Quel est le prix correct (neuf)? :" & {!What_is_the_correct_price_new}, NULL))))) &
{!Linebreak} & IF(NOT(ISBLANK( {!Listing_ID})), "Listing ID :" & {!Listing_ID},NULL) &
{!Linebreak} & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!BMID_3})), {!Linebreak} & "BMID :" & {!BMID_3} ,NULL) &
{!Linebreak} & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!URL.value})), {!Linebreak} & "URL :" & {!URL.value}, NULL)

fields.name: Carrier_Investigation
fields.fieldText: *Carrier investigations: Only sellers having a contract with Back Market (FBBM) will be supported. Please do not submit your request if you're working directly with Cubyn. Requests related to a return label (provided through BackShip) should be submitted through the "BackShip" option above.

fields.name: Needed_documents_to_open_an_investigation_4
fields.fieldText: Needed documents to open an investigation:

fields.name: Order_directly
fields.fieldText: You can order directly on https://mana.backmarket.com/login instead of using the Seller Support Center. However, if you need some assistance, please fill the checkbox and let us know how we can help you.

fields.name: First_order
fields.fieldText: If this is your first order, please attach your ID card and certificate of incorporation (Kbis or equivalent).

fields.fieldText: Which payment method does your question refer to?

fields.name: Alright_your_request_relates_to_the_P2B_regulation_Please_give_us_more_details_2
fields.fieldText: Alright, your request relates to the P2B regulation. Please give us more details:

fields.name: Order_ID_1_Finance
fields.fieldText: Order ID
fields.helpText: If your request is related to more than just one order, please indicate all those order numbers directly in the description field.

fields.name: Description_2
fields.fieldText: Description
fields.helpText: Please add as much information as possible, including payment information, tracking information, order date...

fields.name: Message_limit_reached
fields.fieldText:
Thanks {!Get_Created_By.FirstName} for reaching out to the Seller Support Center.


Unfortunately, it seems that you’ve already hit your daily limitation in submitting support tickets through the SSC.

 

Sending several requests on the same day is not efficient, neither for your team, neither for our Seller Support Teams. Please specify your doubts under one request, and send multiple order numbers if needed.


The limitation will be removed by tomorrow, and we’re happy to welcome you back then.

fields.name: Message_limit_reached_fr
fields.fieldText:
Merci {!Get_Created_By.FirstName} d’avoir contacté le Seller Support Center.

﻿

Malheureusement, il semblerait que vous ayez atteint la limite journalière pour la soumission de tickets dans le SSC.


L’envoi de plusieurs demandes dans la même journée n’est pas efficace, ni pour vos équipes, ni pour les nôtres. Merci d’indiquer vos remarques ou potentielles interrogations sous le même ticket, et d’y inclure plusieurs numéros de commandes si nécessaire.

 

La limite sera levée dès demain, et vous pourrez à nouveau nous contacter.

fields.fieldText: Please Add Request Details

fields.name: ENG
fields.fieldText:
Submit a request


The Seller Support Center allows you to easily submit your support requests and to track them using the "My Existing Requests" button on the top right. Feel free to have a look at our "Introduction to the Seller Support Center" section to get more information. 😊

fields.name: Your_Question_is_About
fields.fieldText: Your Question is About

fields.name: Success
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for reaching out to the Seller Support Center at Back Market.

Your request has been received by our team and will be answered in the next 24 hours.


Your case ID : {!GetNewCase.CaseNumber}


To avoid delaying the management of your request, make sure it isn't updated or renewed without a first answer from us.

If you want to add attachments, you may do so below.


In the meantime, have you looked in our FAQ for a solution?
